languages.text:
"Идешь ты не на битву, а в силок,
Сплетенный из коварства и раздора.
Владычица страстей взнесла клинок,
На кровь твою сбежится ее свора.
Танцуй, пари, забвенье одолей,
Жди знака от мелодии ночной.
Когда узришь его, порхай скорей
В разверзнутую пасть перед собой".

traits.locale_text:
"Идешь ты не на битву, а в силок,
Сплетенный из коварства и раздора.
Владычица страстей взнесла клинок,
На кровь твою сбежится ее свора.
Танцуй, пари, забвенье одолей,
Жди знака от мелодии ночной.
Когда узришь его, порхай скорей
В разверзнутую пасть перед собой".
traits.speaker: Zanni

languages.text:
"You stride not into battle but a snare,
Of guile and strife a neatly woven net,
Lust's mistress lifts her sword into the air
And baying for your blood her pack does set.
So dance a ring around oblivion,
Await a sign from night's own melody.
Catch sight of it, and then, make haste, begone!
One yawning mouth, one leap, to set you free."
languages.original_text:
"Идешь ты не на битву, а в силок,
Сплетенный из коварства и раздора.
Владычица страстей взнесла клинок,

Танцуй, пари, забвенье одолей,
Жди знака от мелодии ночной.
Когда узришь его, порхай скорей
В разверзнутую пасть перед собой".

languages.text:
“在你面前的并不是战场，而是陷阱，
诡诈与争斗的罗网，织得密不透风。
欲望的女主人，手中利剑高高举到空中，
她的畜群迫不及待，为你的鲜血而轰鸣。
跳起舞来，在遗忘周身围绕，
等待黑夜的旋律发出的信号。
仔细看好，抓紧时间，马上动手！
一张巨口，一场跳跃，重获自由。”
languages.original_text:
"You stride not into battle but a snare,
Of guile and strife a neatly woven net,
Lust's mistress lifts her sword into the air
And baying for your blood her pack does set.
So dance a ring around oblivion,
Await a sign from night's own melody.
Catch sight of it, and then, make haste, begone!
One yawning mouth, one leap, to set you free."

一张巨口，一场跳跃，重获自由。”
traits.speaker: Zanni

languages.text:
«Marchas no a la batalla, sino a la farsa,
tejida en una red de taima e inquina.
La dama de la lujuria su espada alza
y su manada aúlla, anhelando tu agonía.
Baila, pues, baila en torno al olvido,
esperando la señal de la noche y su melodía.
¡Hazte con ella y corre hacia tu destino!
Salta a las fauces abiertas con osadía».
languages.original_text:
"You stride not into battle but a snare,
Of guile and strife a neatly woven net,
Lust's mistress lifts her sword into the air
And baying for your blood her pack does set.
So dance a ring around oblivion,
Await a sign from night's own melody.
Catch sight of it, and then, make haste, begone!
One yawning mouth, one leap, to set you free."

Salta a las fauces abiertas con osadía».
traits.speaker: Zanni

languages.text:
「戦地に行くつもりでも、待ち受けるのは罠
狡猾と紛争の巧妙に編まれた網
欲望の愛人が剣を振り上げ
君の血を求めて群れが襲いかかる。
だから忘却の周りを輪になって踊れ
夜が奏でる旋律の兆しを待て。
見つけたら急いで立ち去れ！
あくびをする口、ひとつの跳躍が君を自由にする」
languages.original_text:
"You stride not into battle but a snare,
Of guile and strife a neatly woven net,
Lust's mistress lifts her sword into the air
And baying for your blood her pack does set.
So dance a ring around oblivion,
Await a sign from night's own melody.
Catch sight of it, and then, make haste, begone!
One yawning mouth, one leap, to set you free."

あくびをする口、ひとつの跳躍が君を自由にする」
traits.speaker: Zanni

languages.text:
"In die Schlacht Ihr zieht als list'ge Falle,
als ein Netz aus Schläue und aus Tücke.
Die Herrin der Lust entfesselt alle,
das Rudel will Euch reißen in Stücke.
Drum tanzt um das ew'ge Nichts wie der Wind,
Tanzt, bis das Zeichen der Nacht kommt herbei.
Und kommt es, dann sputet Euch, fort, geschwind!
ein großer Mund, ein Sprung und Ihr seid frei."
languages.original_text:
"You stride not into battle but a snare,
Of guile and strife a neatly woven net,
Lust's mistress lifts her sword into the air
And baying for your blood her pack does set.
So dance a ring around oblivion,
Await a sign from night's own melody.
Catch sight of it, and then, make haste, begone!
One yawning mouth, one leap, to set you free."

traits.speaker: Zanni

languages.text:
« Vous ne courez pas au combat, mais dans un traquenard,
Un filet tissé par les querelles et les duperies,
La maîtresse de l'envie brandit son poignard
Et sa meute réclame votre sang à hauts cris.
Alors, autour de l'oubli, dansez en tournoyant
Et attendez un signe de la mélodie de la nuit.
Apercevez-le et disparaissez, sans perdre un instant !
Une gueule béante, un saut et vous voilà {mf|affranchi|affranchie}. »
languages.original_text:
"You stride not into battle but a snare,
Of guile and strife a neatly woven net,
Lust's mistress lifts her sword into the air
And baying for your blood her pack does set.
So dance a ring around oblivion,
Await a sign from night's own melody.
Catch sight of it, and then, make haste, begone!
One yawning mouth, one leap, to set you free."

traits.locale_text:

traits.speaker: Zanni

languages.text:
"Savaş değildir gittiğin, tuzağın yolunu tuttun,
Kendini hile ve kavgayla örülü bir ağda buldun.
Arzuların hanımı; kılıcını havaya kaldırır,
Sürüsünün ant içtiği intikamı senden alır.
Nisyanın etrafında et bir dans dönerek,
İşareti bekle gecenin melodisinden gelecek.
Gözüne iliştiğinde durma, kaç, çabuk ol!
Kocaman bir ağız ve sıçrayışla özgürlüğe uzanır o yol."
languages.original_text:
"You stride not into battle but a snare,
Of guile and strife a neatly woven net,
Lust's mistress lifts her sword into the air
And baying for your blood her pack does set.
So dance a ring around oblivion,

Catch sight of it, and then, make haste, begone!
One yawning mouth, one leap, to set you free."

Nisyanın etrafında et bir dans dönerek,

Gözüne iliştiğinde durma, arkana bakmadan kaç, çabuk ol!
Kocaman bir ağız ve bir sıçrayışla özgürlüğe uzanır o yol."
traits.speaker: Zanni
